column4: sorry might miss the post here, but i would like to ask this question,any one have installed gyachi in hardy? can some one direct me to the correct pkg i only see pkg for gutsy in this url http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=158490&package_id=177556&release_id=551575 thanks!
